title: Writing on an old Danish fort in Lyngby
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822103917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lyngby_Fort_Portalen_5590.jpg)

[http://www.vestvolden.info/NY\_Lyngby\_Fort\_images.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822103917/http:/www.vestvolden.info/NY_Lyngby_Fort_images.htm "http://www.vestvolden.info/NY\_Lyngby\_Fort\_images.htm")

I need to identyfy the font for restoration purpuse
author: RasmusKruse

comments.content: A semibold Century 751 or Century Schoolbook, with the width narrowed, would replicate it nicely.
Thank you I will see if I can make that work
